Package org.etourdot.xincproc.xinclude

Class XIncProcUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.etourdot.xincproc.xinclude.XIncProcUtils
  • public final class XIncProcUtils
extends Object
    This class provide utilities constants, variables and methods for the XIncProcEngine.

        public static URI resolveBase​(URI baseURI,
                              Stack<URI> stack)
                       throws XIncludeFatalException
        Resolve base URI against a Stack of uris.
        Parameters:
        baseURI - the base uRI
        stack - the stack
        Returns:
        the resolved URI
        Throws:
        XIncludeFatalException - in case of inclusion loop

      • readTextURI

        public static String readTextURI​(URI source,
                                 String encoding,
                                 String accept,
                                 String acceptLanguage)
                          throws XIncludeFatalException,
                                 XIncludeResourceException
        Read a text source from the URI
        Parameters:
        source - the source
        encoding - the encoding, if encoding is null an analyse of the source will be done to find correct encoding
        accept - the accept
        acceptLanguage - the accept language
        Returns:
        string text readed
        Throws:
        XIncludeFatalException - in case of fatal error
        XIncludeResourceException - if source is unreadable
